snippet: CBS has ordered a pilot for a spinoff, “How I Met Your Dad.”
abstract: CBS orders pilot for spinoff of popular comedy How I Met Your Mother, which is ending after nine seasons; show will put female spin on original concept, in How I Met Your Dad.
lead_paragraph: CBS has ordered a pilot for a spinoff, “How I Met Your Dad.”

headline.print_headline: ‘How I Met Your Mother’ To Get a CBS Spinoff
